entry.title: Introducing SeaORM
entry.summary: We are pleased to introduce SeaORM 0.2.2 to the Rust community today. It's our pleasure to have received feedback and contributions from awesome people to SeaQuery and SeaORM since 0.1.0.

entry.title: Release Model
entry.summary: Today we will outline our release plan in the near future.

entry.title: Hello World
entry.summary: After 8 months of secrecy, SeaORM is now public!

entry.title: Welcome to SeaORM
entry.summary: One year ago, when we were writing data processing algorithms in Rust, we needed an async library to interface with a database. Back then, there weren't many choices. So we have to write our own.
